response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. After careful consideration and evaluation of its unique features, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. I am offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $7,500. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in its value and potential impact on your endeavors. I look forward to the opportunity to discuss how this product can benefit you further. Please let me know if you have any questions or require additional information.", "product_price": 7500}
